markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: ## Week 2 Lesson 2 ## Last lesson - Exercise A: HTML tags/attr - Exercise B: Creating image links - Exercise C: Creating email links - Exercise D: CSS Float ## This lesson - Source Control: Git and Github - JavaScript Exercises on topics from last week - How to do Exercises from Exercism ## Git and Github #### Git (On your local machine) ### Git + Github = ðŸ’¯ ## Show me the code! ### What to do after class - Review CSS and HTML - Try to do the "flower shop" Challenge
